attributes.action: Withdraw Taxpayers Money From The Banks who are given Bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Request the Prime Minister to with draw taxpayers money from the Banks that believe that Tax payers money can be used to pay bonuses to staff after we the taxpayer have bailed then out.  If the bank folds then The Bank of England should take it over completetly and nationals it.
